Html: We don't have certificate to import it in WPP tool. But instead of that one of our package team will help us to create a package and inject the certificate then we can import that package to WSUS server through WPP tool. Is this way work ?

The certificate must have "Code-Signing" ability. the file must be a .pfx file (certificate with password to protect the private key), the private key must be Embedded into the certificate, you must import the certificate with WPP.
